form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Bennet (for himself and Ms. Collins) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to classify certain automatic fire sprinkler system retrofits as 15-year property for purposes of depreciation.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the High Rise Fire Sprinkler Incentive Act of 2025.

section.header: Classification of certain automatic fire sprinkler system retrofits

subsection.text: Section 168(e)(3)(E) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking and at the end of clause (vi), by striking the period at the end of clause (vii) and inserting , and, and by adding at the end the following:

clause.text: any automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property.

subsection.text: Section 168(b)(3) of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: Any automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property.

subsection.text: The table contained in section 168(g)(3)(B) of such Code is amended by inserting after the item relating to subparagraph (E)(vii) the following:

subsection.header: Definition of automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property
subsection.text: Section 168(i) of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: Automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property
paragraph.text: The term automatic fire sprinkler system retrofit property means any sprinkler system which—

subparagraph.text: meets the standards of National Fire Protection Association 13 (or any successor benchmark),
is installed for use in residential property, and
is installed in a building which—

clause.text: was placed in service before the date of such installation, and
has an occupiable floor more than 75 feet above the lowest level of fire department vehicle access.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply after the date of enactment of this Act.
